sentences.english: Flamingos feeding lakes can be found throughout Africa.

sentences.english: The flamingos and baboons here at Lake Bogoria live in harmony.
sentences.chinese: 在这里，火烈鸟和狒狒在博戈尼亚湖和谐相处。

sentences.english: Now, the island is one of only a handful of Lesser Flamingo breeding colonies in the world.
sentences.chinese: 目前该岛是世界上为数不多的小火烈鸟繁殖基地之一。

sentences.english: In my family , I am a flamingo in the flock of pigeons.

sentences.english: The Zoo has a flock of 64 flamingos.
One of the strangest sights in nature is the courtship dance of the lesser flamingo.
sentences.chinese: 火烈鸟的求偶舞是大自然最奇怪的景象之一。

sentences.english: Now there are at least 10, 000 flamingos migrating to and from the island.
sentences.chinese: 现在至少有10000只火烈鸟移民来往这座小岛。

sentences.english: He’s really big, bigger than a flamingo.
sentences.chinese: 它可真大，比火烈鸟都大。

sentences.english: I am a flamingo in a flock of pigeons.
sentences.chinese: 我是被困在鸽笼里的火烈鸟。

sentences.english: I open the book to Flamingo.

sentences.english: It is the only site in East Africa where Lesser Flamingos successfully nest.
sentences.chinese: 该湖是在东非仅有的一处小火烈鸟成功的繁殖地。
他们已经偷走了12只智利产粉红色火烈鸟。
